description:
Looking for a versatile canoe that won't break the bank? The Saranac 160 is the perfect option for families, anglers or casual canoeists. It's packed with tons of features, including rod holders, storage compartments and trays - perfect for keeping your gear organized on the go. Contoured seats with adjustable seat backs makes for a comfortable day on the water. Whether you’re chasing that elusive trophy fish or out for a scenic cruise, this functional paddle craft checks all the boxes.

  • Made of durable thermoformed polyethylene
  • Super comfortable contoured foam-molded seats with adjustable backrests
  • Centre storage compartment and 6-inch round hatch for protecting gear from damaging elements
  • Storage trays conveniently located under the seats
  • Built-in rod holders to keep your gear organized
  • Comfortable carrying handles on the bow and stern for easy transport
  • Flat bottom provides great stability on calm water
name: Old Town Saranac 160
